UI_POPUP_MENU_WIDTH Function> The UI_POPUP_MENU_WIDTH() function returns the width of a popup menu (with optional height restriction).
Width as N = UI_POPUP_MENU_WIDTH(C menubar[,N height_limit])
Width The width of the menu in inches.
menubar The name of a menu.
height_limit Optional. Height limit for the menu. Numeric
? ui_popup_menu_width("menu1") = 1.229167 Desktop applications only.
